metadata.name: Align Spec, OpenAPI, Code, and Tests
metadata.shortDescription: Detect drift and align functional spec, OpenAPI, implementation code, and tests with least-impact recommendations.
metadata.description: For a demand folder, select the latest functional spec + OpenAPI contract, compare them to the implementation code and tests, produce a drift report and least-impact alignment plan, and (after approval) apply the selected alignment without modifying DB/DDL artifacts.
objectives: Select latest demand spec artifacts and validate paths
Detect drift across functional spec, OpenAPI, code, and tests
Recommend least-impact alignment steps with an explicit source-of-truth
Apply alignment changes after approval without modifying DB/DDL artifacts
metadata.author: OLAF Framework
